AMUZIA.description: Fun is as important as academics. Compete against each other to find the ultimate gamer

events.Fandom: Fandom's here with the most fun quizzes on your favourite TV shows and memes

events.Flash: Share your perspective of this world, freezing reality frame by frame.

AVIONICA.description: Showcase and implement your knowledge about the laws and concepts of Physics

events.TAKEOFF: Want to reach for stars? Well you gotta start somewhere! Plan the trajectory and let go of the plane.

events.CONTRAPTION: Design, modify, reinvent and re-engineer to make a system of energy conversions.

events.SUBSTANTIA ON THE ETCH: Sky is the limit only until you find the right concoction to pierce right through.

events.TECH ESCAPE: The stakes are high and oxygen runs low. In order to escape and survive the answers you must know.

CODIFICA.description: Pit yourself against the best and test your coding skills

events.FLIP IT: Break free from the bounds of familiarity. Test your coding competence along with your teamwork.

events.WEBSCAPE: Code, compete and re-imagine to embellish a partially designed website.

events.RETRACER: The path from input to output does exist. Do you have the vision to find it?

events.CODE JUNKIE: The right place for coding aficionados to live their passion and decode their way to supremacy.

ILLUMINATI.description: Come Conquer Conquest. Close your books, open your mind. Where smart answers won't get you fired.

events.INDIKYA: A pH test for your patriotic fervor. Bring out the quiz patriot in you.

events.TECH DE BAIT: It is better to debate a question without settling it than to settle a question without debating it.

events.TORQUEST: Drift along the scientific questionnaire pool, knock down the resistance from your opponents and finish a Technocrat.

LOGICA.description: Get ready for exciting logical reasoning full of Puzzles, Maths and more.

events.DELTA SIGMA PI: Mathematics is, in its way, the poetry of logical ideas. We invite you to embrace it!

events.INTEGRATON BEE: Is Math an integral part of your life? Integrate your thoughts, differentiate your distractions and grow wiser exponentially.

PRODIGIUM.description: The answer lies like a needle in a haystack and clues just within your eyesight. Do you have what it takes?

events.SHERLOCKED: There is nothing more deceptive than an obvious fact. Scratch your brain with Watson to find the truth.

events.GOOGLER: Find the answers to the most trivial questions. The answer lies in your ability to use Google in the most efficient way.

ROBOTICA.description: Dive in the world of robots. Participate in exciting robot events

events.BOT WRESTLING: The territory is marked and your aim is simple. Stay in the ring, push your opponents out and the trophy is yours.

events.VIRTUAL ROBOTICS: Simulation of robots will give you the real sense of victory in the virtual world.

events.ROBO RACES: Want to feed your need for speed? Then race your robot in this ultimate battle of superiority.

events.ROBO FALCONARY: Would you rather walk or run to victory? Let us make the choice for you. Be part of Robo Falconry and fly towards victory.

events.SEARCH N' DESTROY: The only road that leads to the first prize is the one that is filled with twists and turns. Maneuver and surge ahead.

events.ROBO WARS: Decimate your enemy because this is the survival of the fittest for your robots.

events.ROBO ROYALE: Complete the given tasks and then prevent your opponent from doing theirs.

STRUKTURA.description: Plan, Build, Create. Dive in world of Civil Engineering.

events.BRIDGE THE GAP: Use your creativity and innovation to build a strong and durable bridge to access the inaccessible.

events.UTOPIA: Envision an ideal city keeping in mind various smart solutions, sustainable measures and inclusion of people.

events.ID CIVIL: Optimize your design and prove your mastery in AutoCAD by putting forth the best structural design.

events.CONQUEST: Mix your Concrete well and build your cylinder robust. This conquest will be won by the last standing cylinder.

VOLTUS.description: Electrify your passion for circuit making and playing with micro controllers

events.CIRCUIT FIXER: No resistance can drop your potential. Build your own circuit and ignite the spark within you!

events.ELECTRADE: Earn money and spend it wisely in an attempt to build the most efficient circuits to complex problems.

events.MICROAPPS: With a microcontroller you can conquer the world. Prove your proficiency in digital electronics and take away the big prize

events.FOX HUNT: A game of hunt devoid of  trail of blood but makes you chase nonetheless.
